DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess effect reduction serum phosphate safety BAY77-1931 ( lanthanum carbonate ) patient hyperphosphatemia undergo continuous ambulatory peritoneal dialysis .
DOC.brief_title: Open Study BAY77-1931 ( Lanthanum Carbonate ) Continuous Ambulatory Peritoneal Dialysis Patients
DOC.criteria: Serum phosphate level : > 5.0 mg/dL < 11.0 mg/dL 2 week initiation washout period Outpatient Undergoing CAPD least previous 3 consecutive month Who may enable continue CAPD Serum phosphate level > =10.0 mg/dL start washout period > =11.0 mg/dL 2 week Corrected serum calcium level < 7.0 mg/dL start washout period > =11.0 mg/dL 2 week Serum intact PTH ( Parathyroid ) > =1000 pg/mL start washout period Pregnant woman , lactate mother Significant gastrointestinal disorder include know acute peptic ulcer Liver dysfunction History cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease
DOC.keyword: Hyperphosphatemia ESRD ( End Stage Renal Disease ) patient dialysis
